about_the_game:
Elyme Arena is a multiplayer battleground where each player chooses their own special Element to battle against other players. Each Element, like Fire, Earth, Wind, or Water, has a unique playstyle, strengths, and weaknesses. They all are balanced enough for fair fights.

Play Elyme Arena For Free!
Invite your friends to compare your skills in each battle with each Element.

Explore All Game Modes
Elyme Arena offers a wide variety of battle styles, from Deathmatch to Tower Defense.
You can fight alone or in a team. Some fights require close co-op to achieve victory.

Open New Elements
As your skills develop, Elyme Arena opens for you new Elements to play with.
Get ready for many surprises with new unique Elements that will be revealed to you.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or more
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I5-8400 or AMD RYZEN 3 3300X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 1060 3 GB or AMD RADEON RX 580 4 GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or more
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I7-8700K or AMD RYZEN 5 3600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 1070 8 GB or AMD RADEON RX VEGA 56 8 GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Choose your Element to fight other players in the ancient battle of Elyme Arena! Play for free with your friends or solo. Find your playstyle with unique Elements, that represent the fundamental forces of nature, such as Fire, Wind, Earth and Water.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
